title: Configure survey mapping app
description: Select a mobile mapping tool (e.g., Fulcrum, ArcGIS QuickCapture) and deploy a template so the owner can log lawn-care usage while walking neighborhoods.
outcome: Shareable survey link + mobile app ready for data capture.

title: Define client-density goal
description: Generate a service-area map and set a target of 20–30 weekly clients within chosen ZIP codes.
outcome: PDF map and written goal statement.

title: File LLC online
description: Complete Colorado Secretary of State web filing for Articles of Organization on behalf of the owner.

title: Register trade name
description: Submit trade-name filing and add annual report due-dates to an automated calendar.

title: Prepare sales-tax license application
description: Auto-fill Grand Junction sales-tax license form and package instructions for e-signature.

title: Draft pesticide applicator application
description: Collect requirements and pre-populate Colorado Commercial Pesticide Applicator forms.

title: Collect liability-insurance quotes
description: Submit business details to online brokers and compare three general-liability policies.

title: Pre-configure commercial auto quotes
description: Store vehicle details and fetch provisional commercial auto quotes for future purchase.

title: Recommend business checking options
description: Compare three banks or fintechs, highlighting mower-friendly hours and low fees, and start online application for the chosen option.

title: Set up bookkeeping software
description: Create account in cloud bookkeeping app, customize chart of accounts, and enable mileage & depreciation tracking.

title: Source zero-turn mower options
description: Scrape dealer listings, compare prices & hours, and draft a purchase order for the best value unit.

title: Source push-mower options
description: Find reliable 21″ commercial push mowers and draft purchase order.

title: Source trimmer & blower options
description: Compare battery-powered trimmer and blower bundles; prepare purchase order.

title: Source trailer options
description: Identify 6′ × 12′ trailers with ramp gates and create purchase order.

section: 6. Price for Margin, Not Just Revenue
title: Generate regional price list
description: Analyze market data and output recommended mowing rates by lawn size.

section: 6. Price for Margin, Not Just Revenue
title: Design season-package pricing
description: Structure 26-week subscription plans and produce customer-facing PDF.

section: 6. Price for Margin, Not Just Revenue
title: Define upsell menu
description: List edging, aeration, fertilization, clean-ups, and snow removal with margin targets.

title: Create Google Business Profile draft
description: Populate profile fields, upload placeholder photos, and enable quote form (awaiting owner verification).

title: Design QR-coded door-hangers
description: Produce print-ready artwork and place an online print order for 500 units.

title: Build HOA & realtor outreach list
description: Scrape local HOA contacts and real-estate agents; draft personalized email templates offering move-in specials.

title: Publish referral program
description: Draft policy for free-first-trim referrals and integrate sign-up form into CRM.

title: Implement routing software
description: Set up LawnPro or Jobber, import client addresses, and generate optimized daily routes.
outcome: Automated routing active; expected drive-time reduction 15 %.

title: Create equipment lifecycle plan
description: Schedule resale or trade-in at 600–800 engine hours and set reminders.

title: Develop off-season service catalog
description: Research snow-plowing, holiday-light installs, and minor landscaping services; create pricing sheet.
